bio.en: Huh Jong-koo served as the former commissioner (invited) of the Tax Tribunal. Formerly, he also served as the director of the personal taxation bureau of the National Tax Service, Director general of the investigation division 2 of Central Regional Tax Office, as well as, an administrative officer of the presidential secretary's office. As a legal(tax accounting) advisor of FingeRate project, he will be responsible for providing consultation about cryptocurrency related issues.
